message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $9,500 for it. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your generosity, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,000?

Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate you're trying to stay within your budget. I can't go all the way down to $8,000, but I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $8,500?  That would be a fair price for both of us. Let me know what you think!
